Name: Navigator
Text: We may not be seal food just yet.

Name: Navigator
Text: Found a survival rifle in them boxes. Thing is...

Name: Navigator
Text: Most of the ammo's bad. I'll have to load new rounds.

Name: Navigator
Text: You shoot, I load. Hold RMB for the rifle. I'll ping you when a new round is done.

Name: Navigator
Text: I've a feeling we'll need it tonight.
